title: Contracts for Symbol Send
description: For a given symbol, get the list of currently available option contracts, and the latest barrier and duration limits for each contract.

region.description: Set to 'japan' to retrieve contracts available under Japanese regulations, or 'other' otherwise.

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
